name: Brickanoid (itch)
description:
My first finished game!

A classic brick breaker game i always wanted to make, i choose this style of game due to its simplicity and how easy is to make, that way i could learn unity in a small scale.

CONTROLS:

  • A | S - Move the paddle left and right 
  • Space bar - Launch the ball and fire lasers
  • ESC - pause the game
